languages.text: {n}Кибелла негромко смеется — ее голос напоминает мурлыканье крупной кошки.{/n} "Этот лабиринт... я хочу навсегда уйти из него. Уйти из рамок, которые стали мне — нам обоим — слишком тесны. Идем со мной. Наша новая жизнь не может начаться, пока наши тени мечутся в стенах ловушки, куда я завела нас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла негромко смеется — ее голос напоминает мурлыканье крупной кошки.{/n} "Игра, мо{mf|й|я} прекрасн{mf|ый|ая} хищни{mf|к|ца}. Сумеешь ли ты поймать меня? Или же сам{mf||а} станешь добычей? Узнаем это, когда вступим в лабиринт — и пройдем его".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла негромко смеется — ее голос напоминает мурлыканье крупной кошки.{/n} "Этот лабиринт... я хочу навсегда уйти из него. Уйти из рамок, которые стали мне — нам обоим — слишком тесны. Идем со мной. Наша новая жизнь не может начаться, пока наши тени мечутся в стенах ловушки, куда я завела нас".

Go beyond the constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life can't begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah se ríe con suavidad. Es como una mezcla de un ronroneo y un gruñido.{/n} «Este laberinto... Quiero dejarlo atrás; ir más allá de las ataduras que nos limitan a mí y a nosotr{mf|o|a}s. Ven conmigo. Nuestra nueva vida no podrá comenzar mientras nuestras sombras sigan golpeándose contra los muros de la trampa a la que nos he conducido».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah se ríe con suavidad. Es como una mezcla de un ronroneo y un gruñido.{/n} «Este laberinto... Quiero dejarlo atrás; ir más allá de las ataduras que nos limitan a mí y a nosotr{mf|o|a}s. Ven conmigo. Nuestra nueva vida no podrá comenzar mientras nuestras sombras sigan golpeándose contra los muros de la trampa a la que nos he conducido».

languages.text: {n}キベラが静かに笑う。それは鳴き声と唸り声が混ざったような音に聞こえた。{/n}「この迷路…私はここから出ていきたいの。私にとって、私たち二人にとって、あまりにも制約が多すぎるこの束縛を超えていきたいの。私と一緒に来て。私が招き入れた罠の壁の中で、私たちの影が暴れ続けている限り、私たちの新たな人生は始まらない」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラが静かに笑う。それは鳴き声と唸り声が混ざったような音に聞こえた。{/n}「この迷路…私はここから出ていきたいの。私にとって、私たち二人にとって、あまりにも制約が多すぎるこの束縛を超えていきたいの。私と一緒に来て。私が招き入れた罠の壁の中で、私たちの影が暴れ続けている限り、私たちの新たな人生は始まらない」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈静静地笑了起来，笑声听起来既像是猫的咕噜声，又像是咆哮声。{/n}“这个迷宫……我打算把它抛在脑后。我打算抛弃那些约束，它们对我们而言过于局限。然而，只要我们的影子还在陷阱里挣扎，我们就没办法开始新的人生。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈静静地笑了起来，笑声听起来既像是猫的咕噜声，又像是咆哮声。{/n}“这个迷宫……我打算把它抛在脑后。我打算抛弃那些约束，它们对我们而言过于局限。然而，只要我们的影子还在陷阱里挣扎，我们就没办法开始新的人生。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lacht leise. Es klingt wie eine Mischung aus Schnurren und Knurren.{/n} "Dieses Labyrinth ... Ich möchte es hinter mir lassen – die Zwänge überwinden, die mich, die uns beide mittlerweile zu sehr einschränken. Kommt mit mir. Unser neues Leben kann nicht beginnen, solange unsere Schatten gegen die Wände der Falle ankämpfen, in die ich uns geführt habe."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lacht leise. Es klingt wie eine Mischung aus Schnurren und Knurren.{/n} "Dieses Labyrinth ... Ich möchte es hinter mir lassen – die Zwänge überwinden, die mich, die uns beide mittlerweile zu sehr einschränken. Kommt mit mir. Unser neues Leben kann nicht beginnen, solange unsere Schatten gegen die Wände der Falle ankämpfen, in die ich uns geführt habe."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah pousse un petit rire, à mi-chemin entre grondement et ronronnement.{/n} « Ce labyrinthe... Je veux le laisser derrière moi, m'affranchir de ces contraintes devenues trop restrictives, pour vous comme pour moi. Venez, notre nouvelle vie ne peut pas commencer tant que nos ombres se débattent entre les murs du piège dans lequel je nous ai {mf|conduits|conduites}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

Je veux le laisser derrière moi, m'affranchir de ces contraintes devenues trop restrictives, pour vous comme pour moi. Venez, notre nouvelle vie ne peut pas commencer tant que nos ombres se débattent entre les murs du piège dans lequel je nous ai {mf|conduits|conduites}. »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sessizce gülüyor. Kahkahası, kulağa mırıltıyla hırıltının bir karışımı gibi geliyor.{/n} "Bu labirent... Onu ardımda bırakmak istiyorum. Benim için... İkimiz için de fazla kısıtlayıcı hâle gelen bu baskıların ötesine geçmek istiyorum. Benimle gel. İkimizi birden çektiğim tuzağın duvarlarında gölgelerimiz debelenip dururken yeni hayatımıza başlayamayız."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah laughs quietly. It sounds like a mix of purr and growl.{/n} "This maze... I want to leave it behind — to go beyond these constraints that have become too limiting for me, for both of us. Come with me. Our new life cannot begin while our shadows still thrash within the walls of the trap I've lead us into."
